creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: close-up of light-colored iris: swaths of grey and white at R arc towards center, ending with yellow and orange at the tips; outlines of pedals and veins in green; white forms with green outlines at center; darker colored swaths at L, with a hint of purple at ULC
inscription: Left: [?????　アイリス] {1954 nen saku, Airisu}; bottom, in pencil: [Iris] [Fujio Yoshida]; LRC of image, in pencil: [Fujio Yoshida]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Iris
